c74object.name: mc.rtpreceive~
c74object.digest: receive audio stream via rtp protocol
c74object.description: receive audio stream via rtp protocol

attribute.name: max_delay
attribute.digest: maximum accepted delay for reordering(in microseconds)
attribute.description: maximum accepted delay for reordering(in microseconds)

attribute.name: reorder_queue_size
attribute.digest: number of packets for reorder queue
attribute.description: number of packets for reorder queue

attribute.name: use_rtsp
attribute.digest: if set to false, use raw rtp protocol instead of using rtsp mux/demuxer(Some options are ignored)
attribute.description: if set to false, use raw rtp protocol instead of using rtsp mux/demuxer(Some options are ignored).

attribute.name: max_port
attribute.digest: minimum port number used for rtsp internal transport
attribute.description: minimum port number used for rtsp internal transport

attribute.name: min_port
attribute.digest: minimum port number used for rtsp internal transport
attribute.description: minimum port number used for rtsp internal transport
